resources.string: The current editing survey has not been saved, do you want to save it?
. Do you have any trouble doing strenuous activities, like carrying a heavy shopping bag or a suitcase?
. Do you have any trouble taking a long walk?
. Do you have any trouble taking a short walk outside of the house?
. Do you need to stay in bed or chair during the day?
. Do you need any help with eating, dressing, washing yourself or using the toilet?
. Were you limited in doing either your work or other daily activities?
. Were you limited in pursuing your hobbies or other leisure time activities?
. Did pain interfere with your daily activities?
. Have you had difficulty in concentrating on things, like reading a newspaper or watching television?
. Have you had difficulty remembering things?
. Has your physical condition or medical treatment interfered with your family life?
. Has your physical condition or medical treatment interfered with your social activities?
. Has your physical condition or medical treatment interfered with your financial condition?
. Have you had problems receiving adequate information about disease and treatment?
. Has the disease or treatment affected your sex life (for the worse)?
. Have you noticed or been told by others that you looked flushed/red?
. Did you have a bloated feeling in your abdomen?
. Have you had a problem with passing wind/gas/flatulence?
. Have you had acid indigestion or heartburn?
. Have you had difficulties with eating?
. Have you had side-effects from your treatment?
. Have you had a problem from repeated injections?
. Were you worried about the tumour recurring in other areas of the body?
. Were you concerned about disruption of home life?
. Have you worried about your health in the future?
. How distressing has your illness or treatment been to those close to you?
. Has weight loss been a problem for you?
. Has weight gain been a problem for you?
. Did you worry about the results of your tests?
. Have you had aches or pains in your muscles or bones?
. Did you have any limitations in your ability to travel?
. How would you rate your overall health during the past week?
. How would you rate your overall quality of life during the past week?
Which type (1-7) best describes your current faeces?
Separate hard lumps, like nuts (hard to pass); also known as goat faeces
Like a sausage but with cracks on its surface
Like a sausage or snake, smooth and soft
Soft blobs with clear cut edges (passed easily)
Fluffy pieces with ragged edges, a mushy stool
Watery, no solid pieces, entirely liquid
